resources.string: No ads, no subscriptions; but open-source and passion.
You have a Lifetime Patron account. That\'s pretty awesome!
You have a Patron account until %s.
If not renewed, you will then be downgraded to free.
We are a small team of volunteers who believe everyone should have access to a free, world-class draughts platform.
We rely on support from people like you to make it possible. If you enjoy using Lidraughts, please consider supporting us by donating and becoming a Patron!
Pay %s once. Be a Lidraughts Patron forever!
Recurring billing, renewing your Patron wings every month.
A single donation that grants you the Patron wings for one month.
Please enter an amount in EUR
We are a small team, so your support makes a huge difference!
